welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Diksmuide, Belgium! Get ready to be enchanted by our charming city, known for its rich history, quaint streets, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and take in all that Diksmuide has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for Kortrijk Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
